mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn,b.* FROM(select s.title, s.writer_id, s.post_id, a.loading_img FROM specialties_regist s JOIN attached_file a ON s.post_id = a.post_id WHERE a.img_type='U2' ORDER BY regist_date DESC)b) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM specialties_regist s JOIN attached_file a ON s.post_id = a.post_id WHERE a.img_type = 'U2'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM specialties_regist s JOIN attached_file a ON s.post_id = a.post_id WHERE s.title LIKE '%${keyword}%' AND a.img_type = 'U2'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn,b.* FROM(select s.title, s.writer_id, s.post_id, a.loading_img FROM specialties_regist s JOIN attached_file a ON s.post_id = a.post_id WHERE s.title LIKE '%${specialtiesVO.title}%' AND a.img_type='U2' ORDER BY regist_date DESC)b) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start} AND #{pagingVO.end}
SELECT post_id, title, content, code_val(type) type, writer_id, area_code, sigungu_code FROM specialties_regist WHERE post_id =#{postId}
SELECT option_id, specialty_type, price, discount_rate FROM specialties_option WHERE post_id = #{postId}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.post_id , a.title , a.content , code_val(a.type) type , a.writer_id , code_val(a.discount) discount , a.sigungu_code , a.area_code , a.regist_date , a.sales_quantity FROM(SELECT s.post_id , s.title , s.content , s.type , s.writer_id , s.discount , s.sigungu_code , s.area_code , s.regist_date , p.sales_quantity FROM specialties_regist s LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) sales_quantity FROM purchase GROUP BY post_id) p ON s.post_id = p.post_id ORDER BY s.regist_date DESC) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
